entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18 except minus 22 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 18 except minus 22 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 01 March 2023
